title: Romeo and Juliet
description: A timeless love story by William Shakespeare about two young star-crossed lovers whose deaths ultimately unite their feuding families.

title: The Lion King
description: A spectacular musical adaptation of Disney's beloved animated film, featuring stunning costumes and memorable songs.

title: Hamlet
description: Shakespeare's masterpiece about the Prince of Denmark's quest for revenge against his uncle who murdered his father.

title: Les Mis√©rables
description: An epic musical based on Victor Hugo's novel, following the lives of several characters in post-revolutionary France.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
description: Andrew Lloyd Webber's haunting musical about a mysterious figure who becomes obsessed with a young soprano.

title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
description: Shakespeare's magical comedy about love, mischief, and fairies in an enchanted forest.

title: Chicago
description: A sultry musical set in the 1920s about fame, fortune, and all that jazz in the Windy City.

title: Macbeth
description: Shakespeare's dark tragedy about ambition, power, and the supernatural in medieval Scotland.

title: Cats
description: Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical about the Jellicle cats and their magical gathering on one special night.

title: The Glass Menagerie
description: Tennessee Williams' memory play about a family trapped by their dreams and illusions in Depression-era St. Louis.
